 2009-19972009-12-10VAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Veterans Affairs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Veterans Health Care Regulations and the Veterans Burial Regulations, 2005
PrecisRegulations Amending the VETERANS HEALTH CARE REGULATIONS AND THE VETERANS BURIAL REGULATIONS, 2005 to provide low-income Allied Veterans, their eligible family/survivors and dependents with the same benefits as other clients who are eligible for War Veterans Allowance and associated health and assistance programs, Funeral and Burial assistance (on behalf of the veteran client), and the Assistance Fund.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0334 Publication Date: 2009-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
